name: Pet Matchmaking
description:
Tinder people and pets.

Customers will come to your humble store seeking new furry friends.

It is up to you to find their "Perfect Match".

You can ask for animals at the local shelter, help an animal in need, OR request one from the evil witch, watch out, your actions have consequences.

Controls:

Right Mouse Button to interact.

A and D to pan camera to other rooms.

Return to the main menu using the top right yellow button on the computer window.
